Class BurgerOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • BurgerOrder

  • public class BurgerOrder
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the items in a Hartatak Burger order and calculates the order's subtotal, tax, and total.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Jamison Bryant (jbryan46@montgomerycollege.edu)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double CHEESEBURGER_PRICE
      The price of a cheeseburger ($5.95)
      static double CONDIMENT_PRICE
      The price of a condiment ($0.25)
      static double DOUBLE_CHEESEBURGER_PRICE
      The price of a double cheeseburger ($6.95)
      static double HAMBURGER_PRICE
      The price of a hamburger ($4.95)
      static double SALES_TAX
      The sales tax (0.0785 cents/dollar)
